testcase.classname: IM.021-001: inventory/printPidLbl - Prints the label configured for DIALOG/IM_PID_LBL/LU_Type
testcase.name: IM.021-001-001: Create a test Load Unit to Print
testcase.system-out: Given set global: idSite = "RL1", idClient = "RK1"..........................passed Given a load unit from storage location "QUELLE-LAG"-"Q-001" to storage location "H01-KLAER"-"K-101" has to be created.passed And the load unit type is "EURO"............................................passed When CRELU is called........................................................passed Then CRELU was successful, saved as "Lu"; transaction saved as "Transaction".passed When PRINT_PID_LBL is used to print PID label for Load Unit "Lu" with document IM_PID_LBL.passed
